entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 70 to 90 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
